FROM customer c
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cc.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY cc.customer_code ORDER BY cc.is_primary DESC, CASE WHEN cc.contact_type = 'PHONE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC, cc.updated_at DESC, cc.contact_code DESC ) AS rn FROM customer_contact cc ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) pc ON pc.customer_code = c.customer_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY m.customer_code ORDER BY m.updated_at DESC, m.membership_code DESC ) AS rn FROM membership m WHERE m.membership_status = 'ACTIVE' ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) m ON m.customer_code = c.customer_code AND m.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
LEFT JOIN membership_grade mg ON mg.membership_grade_code = m.membership_grade_code AND mg.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT l.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY l.customer_code ORDER BY l.updated_at DESC, l.loyalty_code DESC ) AS rn FROM loyalty l WHERE l.loyalty_status = 'ACTIVE' ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) l ON l.customer_code = c.customer_code AND l.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
LEFT JOIN loyalty_grade lg ON lg.loyalty_grade_code = l.loyalty_grade_code AND lg.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.customer_code, p.hotel_group_code, r.reservation_channel, r.reserved_at, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY p.hotel_group_code, r.customer_code ORDER BY r.reserved_at DESC, r.reservation_code DESC ) AS rn FROM reservation r JOIN property p ON p.property_code = r.property_code ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) rr ON rr.customer_code = c.customer_code AND rr.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
mapper.select:
SELECT c.customer_code AS customerCode, c.customer_name_enc AS customerNameEnc, pc.contact_value_enc AS primaryContactEnc, c.customer_status AS status,
mg.grade_name AS membershipGrade, lg.loyalty_grade_name AS loyaltyGrade,
DATE(c.updated_at) AS lastUsedDate, rr.reservation_channel AS inflowChannel,
c.contract_type AS contractType, c.nationality_type AS nationalityType, c.dek_enc AS dekEnc
ORDER BY
c.created_at c.customer_code c.customer_name_enc c.updated_at c.created_at
ASC DESC
, c.customer_code DESC
LIMIT #{page.size} OFFSET #{page.offset}

SELECT c.customer_code AS customerCode, c.customer_name_enc AS customerNameEnc, c.dek_enc AS dekEnc,
c.customer_status AS status, c.nationality_type AS nationalityType, c.contract_type AS contractType,
rr.reservation_channel AS inflowChannel,
pp.contact_value_enc AS primaryPhoneEnc, pe.contact_value_enc AS primaryEmailEnc,
mb.member_code AS memberCode, mb.created_at AS memberCreatedAt,
mg2.grade_name AS membershipGradeName, m2.membership_status AS membershipStatus, m2.joined_at AS membershipJoinedAt, m2.calculated_at AS membershipCalculatedAt, m2.expired_at AS membershipExpiredAt,
lg2.loyalty_grade_name AS loyaltyGradeName, l2.loyalty_status AS loyaltyStatus, l2.joined_at AS loyaltyJoinedAt, l2.calculated_at AS loyaltyCalculatedAt
FROM customer c
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.customer_code, p.hotel_group_code, r.reservation_channel, r.reserved_at, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY p.hotel_group_code, r.customer_code ORDER BY r.reserved_at DESC, r.reservation_code DESC ) AS rn FROM reservation r JOIN property p ON p.property_code = r.property_code ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) rr ON rr.customer_code = c.customer_code AND rr.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cc.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY cc.customer_code ORDER BY cc.is_primary DESC, cc.updated_at DESC, cc.contact_code DESC ) AS rn FROM customer_contact cc WHERE cc.contact_type = 'PHONE' ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) pp ON pp.customer_code = c.customer_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cc.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY cc.customer_code ORDER BY cc.is_primary DESC, cc.updated_at DESC, cc.contact_code DESC ) AS rn FROM customer_contact cc WHERE cc.contact_type = 'EMAIL' ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) pe ON pe.customer_code = c.customer_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT mb.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY mb.customer_code ORDER BY mb.updated_at DESC, mb.member_code DESC ) AS rn FROM member mb ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) mb ON mb.customer_code = c.customer_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY m.customer_code ORDER BY m.updated_at DESC, m.membership_code DESC ) AS rn FROM membership m ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) m2 ON m2.customer_code = c.customer_code AND m2.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
LEFT JOIN membership_grade mg2 ON mg2.membership_grade_code = m2.membership_grade_code AND mg2.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT l.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY l.customer_code ORDER BY l.updated_at DESC, l.loyalty_code DESC ) AS rn FROM loyalty l ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ) l2 ON l2.customer_code = c.customer_code AND l2.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
LEFT JOIN loyalty_grade lg2 ON lg2.loyalty_grade_code = l2.loyalty_grade_code AND lg2.hotel_group_code = c.hotel_group_code
WHERE c.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} AND c.customer_code = #{customerCode}

SELECT cc.contact_code AS contactCode, cc.contact_type AS contactType, cc.contact_value_enc AS contactValueEnc, cc.is_primary AS isPrimary, cc.marketing_opt_in AS marketingOptIn, cc.consent_at AS consentAt, cc.created_at AS createdAt, cc.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM customer_contact cc WHERE cc.customer_code = #{customerCode} ORDER BY cc.is_primary DESC, CASE WHEN cc.contact_type = 'PHONE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC, cc.updated_at DESC, cc.contact_code DESC

SELECT c.customer_code AS customerCode, c.customer_status AS status, c.caution_at AS cautionAt, c.inactive_at AS inactiveAt, c.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM customer c WHERE c.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} AND c.customer_code = #{customerCode}

SELECT h.customer_status_history_code AS customerStatusHistoryCode, h.before_status AS beforeStatus, h.after_status AS afterStatus, h.change_source AS changeSource, h.change_reason AS changeReason, h.changed_at AS changedAt, h.employee_code AS employeeCode, e.employee_name_enc AS employeeNameEnc, e.dek_enc AS employeeDekEnc FROM customer_status_history h JOIN customer c ON c.customer_code = h.customer_code AND c.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} LEFT JOIN employee e ON e.employee_code = h.employee_code AND e.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} WHERE h.customer_code = #{customerCode} ORDER BY
h.changed_at h.customer_status_history_code h.changed_at
ASC DESC
, h.customer_status_history_code DESC LIMIT #{page.size} OFFSET #{page.offset}

SELECT cc.contact_code AS contactCode, cc.contact_type AS contactType, cc.contact_value_enc AS contactValueEnc, cc.is_primary AS isPrimary, cc.marketing_opt_in AS marketingOptIn, cc.consent_at AS consentAt, cc.created_at AS createdAt, cc.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM customer_contact cc WHERE cc.customer_code = #{customerCode} ORDER BY cc.is_primary DESC, CASE WHEN cc.contact_type = 'PHONE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC, cc.updated_at DESC, cc.contact_code DESC

SELECT c.customer_code AS customerCode, c.customer_name_enc AS customerNameEnc, cc.contact_value_enc AS phoneEnc, c.dek_enc AS dekEnc FROM customer c LEFT JOIN customer_contact cc ON c.customer_code = cc.customer_code AND cc.contact_type = 'PHONE' AND cc.is_primary = TRUE WHERE c.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} AND c.customer_code = #{customerCode}
